tool.name: Create Ranked or DEG Lists
tool.description: from a contrast dataset or single contrast in your history or in the Confero DB
tool.command: ../bin/cfo_run_cmd.pl create_rnk_deg_lists --rank-column="$rank_column" --output-id-type="$id_type" #if $data_source_cond.data_source == "confero_db" --data-id="$data_source_cond.data_type_cond.data_id" #if $rank_column.value == "S" or $rank_column.value == "M" --output-file=$rnk_list_1 #else if $rank_column.value == "P" --output-file=$deg_list_1 #end if #if $data_source_cond.data_type_cond.data_type == "contrast_dataset" #if $rank_column.value == "S" or $rank_column.value == "M" --output-file-galaxy-id=$rnk_list_1.id #else if $rank_column.value == "P" --output-file-galaxy-id=$deg_list_1.id #end if --output-dir=$__new_file_path__ #end if #else if $data_source_cond.data_source == "galaxy_history" --input-file=$data_source_cond.dataset_file --orig-filename="$data_source_cond.dataset_file.name" #if $rank_column.value == "S" or $rank_column.value == "M" --output-file=$rnk_list_2 #else if $rank_column.value == "P" --output-file=$deg_list_2 #end if #if $rank_column.value == "S" or $rank_column.value == "M" --output-file-galaxy-id=$rnk_list_2.id #else if $rank_column.value == "P" --output-file-galaxy-id=$deg_list_2.id #end if --output-dir=$__new_file_path__ #end if

param.name: rank_column
param.label: Select S or M for Ranked List, P for DEG List

param.name: id_type
param.label: Output ID Type
param.help: IMPORTANT: leave as default output ID type of Entrez Gene IDs for use in Confero

tool.help: This tool will generate ranked or DEG lists from a contrast dataset or single contrast in your Galaxy history or from the Confero DB.
